body: Indeed it's a fiat 500. One of the most unreliable car brands out there. Even the show Top Gear made a joke about it's name "FIAT= Fix It Again Tony", same fate goes to the fun but unreliable Abarth 500. One of my dreams cars but FIAT's reputation makes me rethink about buying one. Be wary folks!
Did...did we skip a few hundred pages or something?
Wtf with the story, so rushed. It's 3 volume worth of story. Could've have been better
why. lol it was better at the first half

The pacing is confusing. 
The way this translation went, the only good thing that came from this is the well drawn Fiat 500
Its incomplete and skipped parts of the story from the raw version
Like the end here implies she'll keep being a prostitute but now she'll be forced to do a bunch of new stuff but she and the kid will be together through it all???

@softouch well even with the full book it doesn't make much sense. All I could understand is that the woman here is married but she works as a prostitute. Then in comes the boy here they start to like each other but there is a rule that the prostitues can't start dating their clients then it's this one then it just seemingly ends and the chapters after are all about different girls.
Of course it doesn't make sense. This person took one chapter half way through this book and post it here https://nhentai.net/g/208762/
Like half the plot is missing
